casebody.data:
Keith DANIELS, Administrator of the Estate of Lorren Alaine Daniels, and Tonya Koonce-Daniels and Keith Daniels, Individually
v.
DURHAM COUNTY HOSPITAL CORPORATION d/b/a Durham Regional Hospital; Doe Corporations One Through Five; and Doe Individuals One Through Five. No. 554P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Robert J. Burford, James W. Vaughan, Raleigh, for Daniels, et al. Timothy P. Lehan, Christopher G. Smith, Raleigh, for Durham Regional Hospital.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of September 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
